C

classes - package classes
 
copyGrid(Button[][]) - Method in class classes.Solutions
Creates a new grid (2D Array) of Buttons and copy's the information of each button from the Grid being sent in.
countFiles() - Method in class classes.Grid
Counts the number of level files in the project directory.
create_menu() - Method in class classes.Grid
Creates the JMenu that contains buttons Exit, Help, About, Show Hint, Show Solution, and Reset Board
createColors() - Method in class classes.Grid
Manually sets the color palette from which button colors will be picked.
createRequiredButtons() - Method in class classes.Grid
Creates the game pieces from the locations listed in the level file and updates the locations in the grid.
